name: Corability (Stingaciu Diana Alexandra)
description:
In Corability, dive into the depths of the ocean and take charge of rebuilding a barrier reef, endangered by the ecological conditions we live with today.

In Corability, dive into the deep sea and take into your hands the reconstruction of the struggling coral reef, put in danger by the ecological conditions with which we live today.

The exercise is inspired by the book "Living with the disorder" by Donna Haraway.

The exercise consisted of a short demonstration based on the book "Living with the disorder" by Donna Haraway.

Team

Made as part of an Interface3 Game Developer training project: https://www.interface3.be/fr/formation/game-developer
